Source.Name: xcb-util
Source.Summary: Additional extensions to the XCB library
Source.Description: The xcb-util package provides additional extensions to the XCB library, many that were previously found in Xlib, but are not part of core X protocol.

Package.Name: xcb-util

Package.Description: The xcb-util package provides additional extensions to the XCB library, many that were previously found in Xlib, but are not part of core X protocol.
